required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of αPD1-MSLN-CAR T Cells to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Effectiveness for Patients With MSLN-positive Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Study of αPD1-MSLN-CAR T Cells to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Effectiveness for Patients With MSLN-positive Advanced Solid Tumors.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, dose escalation clinical study to evaluate the safety and tolerability of autologous mesothelin (MSLN)-targeted chimeric antigen receptor (MSLN-CAR) T cells secreting PD-1 nanobodies (αPD1-MSLN-CAR T cells) in patients with solid tumors.

secondary_outcome.description: Clinical response will be assessed by RECIST 1.1.
